hero.title: Find Skilled Part-Time Workers for Any Task
hero.subtitle: Connect with reliable personnel for car wash, gardening, and more!

carWash.title: Car Wash
carWash.description: Car cleaning services at your doorstep.

gardening.title: Gardening
gardening.description: Gardeners to maintain and beautify your outdoor spaces.

other.title: Other Services
other.description: From home repairs to pet sitting, find help for any task.

step1.title: Post a Request
step1.description: Describe your task and set your budget.

step3.title: Get It Done
step3.description: Choose an offer and get your task completed.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
satisfaction.description: If you're not happy with the service, we'll make it right or refund your money.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Our team regularly checks the quality of work to ensure high standards.

topRated.title: Top-Rated Personnel
topRated.description: We only work with the best-rated service providers in each category.

secureTransactions.title: Secure Transactions
secureTransactions.description: Your payments are secure and only released when you're satisfied with the work.

verifiedPersonnel.title: Verified Personnel
verifiedPersonnel.description: All our service providers undergo thorough background checks.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Book services at your convenience, even on short notice.

transparentPricing.title: Transparent Pricing
transparentPricing.description: No hidden fees. See exact costs before booking.
